QueryViewSpec.Name: Inventory Process Current Inventory Output Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Query view output format for the current food bank inventory.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Technical Training

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select C.ID, C.NAME, FI.NAME as FOODITEMNAME, sum(case when FBTH.FOODBANKTXTYPECODE = 0 then FBTD.QUANTITY else FBTD.QUANTITY * -1 end) as FOODITEMCOUNT from dbo.CONSTITUENT C join dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER FBTH on C.ID = FBTH.FOODBANKID join dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL FBTD on FBTH.ID = FBTD.FOODBANKTXHEADERID join dbo.USR_FOODITEM FI on FBTD.FOODITEMID = FI.ID group by C.ID, C.NAME, FI.NAME
